title: JSX fails with 'resolve is deprecated, use Q instead. Error'
body:
I am getting this error when I run jsx.

```
resolve is deprecated, use Q instead. Error
    at Function.Q_deprecate [as resolve] (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:167:21)
    at getConfigP (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/commoner.js:337:18)
    at cliBuildP (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/commoner.js:290:19)
    at Promise_spread_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1049:26)
    at Promise_then_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:760:44)
    at Promise_done_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:829:31)
    at Fulfilled_dispatch [as dispatch] (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1212:9)
    at Pending_become_eachMessage_task (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1330:30)
    at flush (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/node_modules/asap/asap.js:27:13)
    at process._tickCallback (node.js:415:13)
fail is deprecated, use catch instead. Error
    at Promise.Q_deprecate [as fail] (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:167:21)
    at cliBuildP (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/commoner.js:315:27)
    at Promise_spread_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1049:26)
    at Promise_then_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:760:44)
    at Promise_done_fulfilled (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:829:31)
    at Fulfilled_dispatch [as dispatch] (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1212:9)
    at Pending_become_eachMessage_task (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/q.js:1330:30)
    at flush (/home/eduardo/prog/banks/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/node_modules/q/node_modules/asap/asap.js:27:13)
    at process._tickCallback (node.js:415:13)
    at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:499:11)
Q.all no longer directly unwraps a promise. Use Q(array).all()
[]
```

Is this happening to anybody else? Am I doing something wrong?
